entity.name: budget
entity.query: select 'budget:' || budget_id id, 'budget' domain1, agency_id, agency_code, agency_name, agency_name || '[' || agency_id || ']' agency_name_id, budget_id, budget_fiscal_year_id, budget_fiscal_year , department_id, department_code, department_name , lower(department_name) || '[' || department_code || ']' department_name_code, budget_code_id, budget_code, budget_code_name, lower(budget_code_name) || '[ ' || budget_code || ' ]' budget_code_name_code, object_class_id, object_class_code , object_class_name , lower(object_class_name) || '[' || object_class_code || ']' object_class_name_code, adopted_amount, current_budget_amount, pre_encumbered_amount, encumbered_amount, cash_expense_amount, post_closing_adjustment_amount, accrued_expense_amount from budget where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID}

entity.name: revenue
entity.query: select 'revenue:' || revenue_id id, 'revenue' domain1, agency_id, agency_code, agency_name, agency_name || '[' || agency_id || ']' agency_name_id, revenue_category_id, revenue_category_name, revenue_category_name || '[' || revenue_category_id || ']' revenue_category_name_id, revenue_category_code, lower(revenue_category_name) || '[' || revenue_category_code || ']' revenue_category_name_code, revenue_class_id, revenue_class_code, revenue_class_name , lower(revenue_class_name) || '[ ' || revenue_class_code || ' ]' revenue_class_name_code, revenue_source_id, revenue_source_code, revenue_source_name , lower(revenue_source_name) || '[ ' || revenue_source_code || ' ]' revenue_source_name_code, fiscal_year_id display_fiscal_year_id, fiscal_year display_fiscal_year, budget_fiscal_year_id, budget_fiscal_year , posting_amount, fund_class_id, fund_class_name , fund_class_code, lower(fund_class_name) || '[' || fund_class_code || ']' fund_class_name_code, funding_class_id, funding_class_name, funding_class_code, lower(funding_class_name) || '[' || funding_class_code || ']' funding_class_name_code, adopted_amount, current_modified_budget_amount from revenue_details where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID}

entity.name: spending
entity.query: select 'spending:' || agency_id || ':' || disbursement_line_item_id id, 'spending' domain1, agency_id, agency_code, agency_name, agency_name || '[' || agency_id || ']' agency_name_id, check_eft_issued_nyc_year_id fiscal_year_id, ry.year_value fiscal_year, department_id, department_code, department_name , lower(department_name) || '[' || department_code || ']' department_name_code, disbursement_line_item_id, vendor_id, vendor_name , vendor_name || '[' || vendor_id || ']' vendor_name_id, vendor_customer_code, lower(vendor_name) || '[ ' || vendor_customer_code || ' ]' vendor_name_code, expenditure_object_id, expenditure_object_code, expenditure_object_name, expenditure_object_name || '[' || expenditure_object_id || ']' expenditure_object_name_id, lower(expenditure_object_name) || '[' || expenditure_object_code || ']' expenditure_object_name_code, check_eft_issued_date, check_amount, reporting_code, fund_class_id, fund_class_name , fund_class_code, lower(fund_class_name) || '[' || fund_class_code || ']' fund_class_name_code, budget_code_id, budget_code , budget_name budget_code_name, lower(budget_name) || '[' || budget_code || ']' budget_code_name_code, disbursement_number document_id, reference_document_number contract_number, agreement_id, master_agreement_id, rsc.spending_category_id, lower(rsc.spending_category_name) || '[' || rsc.spending_category_code || ']' spending_category_name_code, rsc.spending_category_name, adt.minority_type_name, case when adt.minority_type_id in (4,5,10) then 'Asian American' when adt.minority_type_id in (2) then 'Black American' when adt.minority_type_id in (7) then 'Non-M/WBE' when adt.minority_type_id in (9) then 'Women' else adt.minority_type_name end as minority_type_name_spending, adt.minority_type_id, case when adt.minority_type_id in (4,5,10) then 10 else adt.minority_type_id end as minority_type_id_spending, adt.payment_id, adt.prime_vendor_id, case when adt.is_prime_or_sub in ('S') then 'Yes' when adt.is_prime_or_sub in ('P') then 'No' else is_prime_or_sub end as is_prime_or_sub, adt.sub_contract_id, adt.vendor_type, adt.is_minority_vendor, 'N/A' commodity_line, 'N/A' budget_name, 'N/A' entity_contract_number, adt.contract_original_agreement_id, case when adt.is_prime_or_sub in ('P') then 'N/A' else adt.prime_vendor_name end as prime_vendor_name from all_disbursement_transactions adt left join ref_year ry on adt.check_eft_issued_nyc_year_id = ry.year_id left join ref_spending_category rsc on rsc.spending_category_id = adt.spending_category_id where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR adt.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID}

entity.name: spending_oge
entity.query: select 'spending:' || dlid.agency_id || ':' || disbursement_line_item_id || 'oge' id, 'spending' domain1, dlid.agency_id, dlid.agency_code, '' agency_name, agency_name oge_agency_name, agency_name || '[' || dlid.agency_id || ']' agency_name_id, 'oge' agency_type, check_eft_issued_nyc_year_id fiscal_year_id, ry.year_value fiscal_year, dlid.department_id, dlid.department_code, dlid.department_name , lower(department_name) || '[' || department_code || ']' department_name_code, disbursement_line_item_id, dlid.vendor_id, dlid.vendor_name , dlid.vendor_name || '[' || dlid.vendor_id || ']' vendor_name_id, vendor_customer_code, lower(dlid.vendor_name) || '[ ' || vendor_customer_code || ' ]' vendor_name_code, expenditure_object_id, expenditure_object_code, expenditure_object_name, expenditure_object_name || '[' || expenditure_object_id || ']' expenditure_object_name_id, lower(expenditure_object_name) || '[' || expenditure_object_code || ']' expenditure_object_name_code, check_eft_issued_date, 'N/A' check_eft_issued_date_export, check_amount, reporting_code, fund_class_id, fund_class_name , fund_class_code, lower(fund_class_name) || '[' || fund_class_code || ']' fund_class_name_code, budget_code_id, budget_code , dlid.budget_name budget_code_name, lower(dlid.budget_name) || '[' || budget_code || ']' budget_code_name_code, disbursement_number document_id, reference_document_number contract_number, agreement_id, master_agreement_id, rsc.spending_category_id, lower(rsc.spending_category_name) || '[' || rsc.spending_category_code || ']' spending_category_name_code, rsc.spending_category_name, oc.oge_contract_number as entity_contract_number, oc.fms_commodity_line as commodity_line, oc.budget_name as budget_name from disbursement_line_item_details dlid left join ref_year ry on dlid.check_eft_issued_nyc_year_id = ry.year_id left join ref_spending_category rsc on rsc.spending_category_id = dlid.spending_category_id left join oge_contract oc on oc.fms_contract_number = dlid.contract_number and oc.fms_commodity_line = dlid.agreement_commodity_line_number where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR dlid.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID}

entity.name: payroll
entity.query: select 'payroll:' || payroll_id id, 'payroll' domain1, payroll_id, agency_id, agency_code, agency_name , agency_name || '[' || agency_id || ']' agency_name_id, department_id, department_code, department_name , lower(department_name) || '[' || department_code || ']' department_name_code, fiscal_year_id, fiscal_year , calendar_fiscal_year_id, calendar_fiscal_year , employee_id, employee_name , civil_service_title, pay_date, pay_date_id, pay_frequency, annual_salary, gross_pay, base_pay, annual_salary, overtime_pay, other_payments from payroll where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID}

entity.name: contracts
entity.query: select 'contracts:' || agreement_id id, original_agreement_id, master_agreement_id, 'contracts' domain1, (case when(document_code ='RCT1') then 'Revenue' else 'Expense' end) category, agency_name, agency_id, agency_code, vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_code, lower(vendor_name) || '[ ' || vendor_code || ' ]' vendor_name_code, vendor_name || '[' || vendor_id || ']' vendor_name_id, contract_number, master_contract_number, award_method_name, award_method_id, agreement_type_name, agreement_type_id, expenditure_object_names, description, COALESCE(effective_begin_date,'1900-01-01') effective_begin_date, COALESCE(effective_end_date,'9999-01-01') effective_end_date, effective_begin_date effective_begin_date_orig, effective_end_date effective_end_date_orig, brd_awd_no apt_pin, tracking_number pin, document_version version_number, registered_date, original_contract_amount original_amount, maximum_contract_amount current_amount, registered_year fiscal_year, registered_year_id fiscal_year_id, rac.award_category_code, lower(rac.award_category_name) || '[' || rac.award_category_code || ']' award_category_name_code, dc.document_code, lower(award_method_name) || '[' || award_method_code || ']' award_method_name_code, expenditure_object_codes, expenditure_object_names, (case when(latest_flag = 'Y') then 'Y' else 'N' end) latest_flag, 'Registered' status, minority_type_name, case when minority_type_id in (4,5,10) then 'Asian American' when minority_type_id in (2) then 'Black American' when minority_type_id in (7) then 'Non-M/WBE' when minority_type_id in (9) then 'Women' else minority_type_name end as minority_type_name_contract, minority_type_id, case when minority_type_id in (4,5,10) then 10 else minority_type_id end as minority_type_id_contract, case when is_prime_or_sub in ('S') then 'Yes' when is_prime_or_sub in ('P') then 'No' else is_prime_or_sub end as is_prime_or_sub, sub_contract_id, prime_vendor_id, is_minority_vendor, vendor_type, 'N/A' commodity_line, 'N/A' budget_name, 'N/A' entity_contract_number, contract_original_agreement_id, case when is_prime_or_sub in ('P') then 'N/A' else prime_vendor_name end as prime_vendor_name from all_agreement_transactions a left join ref_document_code dc on a.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_award_category rac on a.award_category_id = rac.award_category_id where dc.document_code in ('MMA1', 'MA1', 'MAR', 'CT1', 'CTR', 'DO1', 'CTA1', 'RCT1') and ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR a.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID} )

entity.name: contracts_oge
entity.query: select 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' id, original_agreement_id, master_agreement_id, 'contracts' domain1, (case when(document_code ='RCT1') then 'Revenue' else 'Expense' end) category, '' agency_name, a.agency_name oge_contracting_agency_name, a.oge_agency_id, a.oge_agency_name, 'oge' agency_type, a.agency_id, a.agency_code, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) as vendor_id, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_name ELSE ogecon.vendor_name END) as vendor_name, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_code ELSE NULL END) vendor_code, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN lower(a.vendor_name) ELSE lower(ogecon.vendor_name) END) || '[ ' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN lower(a.vendor_code) ELSE NULL END) || ' ]' vendor_name_code, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_name ELSE ogecon.vendor_name END) || '[' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || ']' vendor_name_id, contract_number, master_contract_number, award_method_name, award_method_id, agreement_type_name, agreement_type_id, expenditure_object_names, description, COALESCE(effective_begin_date,'1900-01-01') effective_begin_date, COALESCE(effective_end_date,'9999-01-01') effective_end_date, effective_begin_date effective_begin_date_orig, effective_end_date effective_end_date_orig, brd_awd_no apt_pin, tracking_number pin, registered_date, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.original_contract_amount ELSE ogecon.original_amount END) original_amount, (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.maximum_contract_amount ELSE ogecon.current_amount END )current_amount, '' fiscal_year, 'N/A' reg_fiscal_year, 'N/A' exp_registration_date, '' fiscal_year_id, rac.award_category_code, lower(rac.award_category_name) || '[' || rac.award_category_code || ']' award_category_name_code, dc.document_code, lower(award_method_name) || '[' || award_method_code || ']' award_method_name_code, expenditure_object_codes, expenditure_object_names, (case when(latest_flag = 'Y') then 'Y' else 'N' end) latest_flag, 'Registered' status, REPLACE(entity_contract_number.values, ', ', ',') As entity_contract_number, budget_names.values As budget_name, REPLACE(commodity_lines.values, ', ', ',') As commodity_line from agreement_snapshot a LEFT JOIN oge_contract_vendor_level ogecon ON a.contract_number = ogecon.fms_contract_number AND a.vendor_id = ogecon.vendor_id left join ref_document_code dc on a.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_award_category rac on a.award_category_id = rac.award_category_id left join ( select distinct 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' id, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct trim(oc.oge_contract_number)) As values from agreement_snapshot a LEFT JOIN oge_contract_vendor_level ogecon ON a.contract_number = ogecon.fms_contract_number AND a.vendor_id = ogecon.vendor_id left join ref_document_code dc on a.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_award_category rac on a.award_category_id = rac.award_category_id left join oge_contract oc on oc.fms_contract_number = a.contract_number AND a.vendor_id = oc.vendor_id where dc.document_code in ('MMA1', 'MA1', 'MAR', 'CT1', 'CTR', 'DO1', 'CTA1', 'RCT1') and ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR a.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID} ) group by 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) ) entity_contract_number on entity_contract_number.id = 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' left join ( select 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' id, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct trim(oc.budget_name)) As values from agreement_snapshot a LEFT JOIN oge_contract_vendor_level ogecon ON a.contract_number = ogecon.fms_contract_number AND a.vendor_id = ogecon.vendor_id left join ref_document_code dc on a.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_award_category rac on a.award_category_id = rac.award_category_id left join oge_contract oc on oc.fms_contract_number = a.contract_number AND a.vendor_id = oc.vendor_id where dc.document_code in ('MMA1', 'MA1', 'MAR', 'CT1', 'CTR', 'DO1', 'CTA1', 'RCT1') and ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR a.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID} ) group by 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) ) budget_names on budget_names.id = 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' left join ( select 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' id, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct trim(oc.fms_commodity_line::varchar)) As values from agreement_snapshot a LEFT JOIN oge_contract_vendor_level ogecon ON a.contract_number = ogecon.fms_contract_number AND a.vendor_id = ogecon.vendor_id left join ref_document_code dc on a.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_award_category rac on a.award_category_id = rac.award_category_id left join oge_contract oc on oc.fms_contract_number = a.contract_number AND a.vendor_id = oc.vendor_id where dc.document_code in ('MMA1', 'MA1', 'MAR', 'CT1', 'CTR', 'DO1', 'CTA1', 'RCT1') and ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR a.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID} ) group by 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) ) commodity_lines on commodity_lines.id = 'contracts:' || agreement_id || ':' || a.agency_id || ':' || (CASE WHEN master_agreement_yn = 'Y' THEN a.vendor_id ELSE ogecon.vendor_id END) || 'oge' where dc.document_code in ('MMA1', 'MA1', 'MAR', 'CT1', 'CTR', 'DO1', 'CTA1', 'RCT1') and ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR a.job_id >= ${dataimporter.request.jobID} )

entity.name: pending_contracts
entity.query: select 'pending_contracts:' || contract_number || version_number id, 'contracts' domain1, (case when(document_code='RCT1') then 'Revenue' else 'Expense' end) category, original_agreement_id, document_agency_name agency_name, document_agency_id agency_id, ra.agency_code, vendor_legal_name vendor_name, vendor_id, vendor_customer_code vendor_code, lower(vendor_legal_name) || '[ ' || vendor_customer_code || ' ]' vendor_name_code, contract_number, fms_parent_contract_number parent_contract_number, version_number, award_method_name, award_method_code, award_method_id, lower(award_method_name) || '[' || award_method_code || ']' award_method_name_code, description, contract_type_name, tracking_number pin, board_award_number apt_pin, start_date, end_date, cif_received_date, revised_maximum_amount, cont_type_code, 'Pending' status, dc.document_code, cif_fiscal_year fiscal_year, cif_fiscal_year_id fiscal_year_id, fms_contract_number, document_version from pending_contracts p left join ref_document_code dc on p.document_code_id = dc.document_code_id left join ref_agency ra on p.document_agency_id = ra.agency_id
